title: How to unsubscribe from Claude
description: Here's how to cancel your Claude subscription. Cancellation takes effect at the end of your current billing period. To avoid being charged for the next billing period, cancel at least 24 hours before your next billing date. Claude AI generally does not offer prorated refunds for canceled subscriptions.

web.title: Cancel Subscription via Claude AI Website
web.description:
To cancel your Claude AI subscription via the website:

*   Go to the Claude AI website: Open claude.ai and log in to your account.
*   Access Account Settings: Look for your profile icon or name, usually in the lower-left or top-right corner. Click on it and navigate to "Settings" or "Subscription".
*   Manage Subscription: Find a section labeled "Subscription" or "Billing".
*   Cancel Subscription: Click the "Cancel" or "Manage" button next to your active plan. Follow the prompts to confirm cancellation.
*   Confirmation: After canceling, you should receive a confirmation email. Check your spam or promotions folders if you don't see it.
*   If using Claude or Claude Desktop: Log into your account on a web browser or open the desktop app. Click on your initials or name in the lower-left corner and select "Settings" from the menu. Navigate to Settings > Billing and click the "Cancel" button.

android_app.title: Cancel Subscription via Claude Android App
android_app.description:
To cancel your Claude AI subscription via the Android app:

*   If using Claude for Android: Click on your initials in the top right corner of Claude for Android, and then click “Billing” from the menu options. Select “Manage subscription” and follow the prompts for cancellation.
*   Alternatively, if you've already removed the app from your Android device: Follow these instructions from the Play Store to unsubscribe: Cancel, pause, or change a subscription on Google Play.

ios_app.title: Cancel Subscription via Claude iOS App
ios_app.description:
To cancel your Claude AI subscription via the iOS app:

*   If using Claude for iOS: Click on your initials in the top right corner of Claude for iOS, and then click “Billing” from the menu options. Select “Manage subscription” and follow the prompts for cancellation.
*   Alternatively, if you've already removed the app from your iOS device: Follow these instructions from the App Store to unsubscribe: If you want to cancel a subscription from Apple.
